pageContent: © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Presented by DelRay Capper  Jenzabar  June 1, 2016  1553 - Financial Aid Credit Hours Update © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  What is Credit Hours Update?     The DelRay Dictionary states: “A Jenzabar EX function used to calculate hours enrolled for a selected Period of Enrollment (POE).” © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  1.   Setup access to the PowerFAIDS database with an ODBC connection.  2.   Define Financial Aid Periods in EX  3.   Define Periods of Enrollment in EX  4.   Cross reference POEs to a registration year/term  5.   Define POE Load by Division  6.   Select courses to count and how to count  Setup Steps © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     This may require IT help.     Setup instructions are located on   MyJenzabar.net .  Setting Up The ODBC Connection © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Settings – Financial Aid      Financial Aid Periods  Define Financial Aid Periods in EX © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Settings – Financial Aid      POE Definition  Define Periods of Enrollments in EX © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Settings – Financial Aid      POE Cross Reference  POE Cross Reference with Registration Years/Terms © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Settings – Financial Aid      POE Load Definition by Division  POE Load by Division © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  The Process – Who?  RE  AV  PF  FAM © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Reads PowerFAIDS Database.     Finds all PowerFAIDS students assigned the selected POE with an SSN match to a student in the EX database.     Populates the Financial Aid Master table with these students.     Updates any null Student Division in the Financial Aid Master with the student’s Current Division from Student Master. © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  The Process – What?  RE   PF FAM © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Settings – Financial Aid      Financial Aid Configuration  Select Courses to Count and How to Count © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     The calculation of hours is either simple or complex depending on your selection of the School is a Federal Aid Participate checkbox.  Simple vs Complex © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     If the School is a Federal Aid Participant box is left unchecked, this would be considered a simple calculation.     Credit Hours Update would just calculate the amount of hours the student is enrolled in for that POE.     Does not matter if the hours contribute to the program or not.     The calculation does consider All Courses or only courses in the student’s current division. This is based on Calculate Credit Hours selection in Financial Aid Configuration.  Simple © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Credit Hours Update continues to calculate Enrolled Hours     But now includes calculation for Financial Aid Eligible Hours  •   Checks for ineligible hours     Repeated & Previously Passed Coursework     Coursework Not Contributing to Financial Aid Eligible Program     Developmental Coursework Above Limit     Non-Degree Seeking Student  Ineligible hours checks largely dependent on Advising Module or the use of special scripts  Complex © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Complex – Financial Aid Master © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Student’s course is identified as a Repeat     Checks to see if student has previously passed course     Passed is based on the grade having been flagged as a “Passing Grade for Financial Aid”     Count the course occurrences since it was passed.  Repeated, Previously Passed Coursework © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Courses flagged as developmental for the term are counted     All courses flagged as developmental the student has taken prior to term are counted     When the sum of these two counts exceeds 30, the hours above 30 are counted as Over-the-Limit  Developmental Hours Over the Limit © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     CIP Code  •   Financial Aid Eligible     Advising Module  •   Advising Requirement Trees  •   Advising Program GPA Profile  Contributes to Program © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Based on courses the student is taking that contribute to the student’s Aims for that Major or Certification     And where that Major or Certification is flagged as Financial Aid Eligible in CIP Definition  Contributes to Program – CIP Code © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Contributes to Program – Advising Requirement Trees     If you are successfully using Advising, this is the Registration Configuration option you should select © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     If you use Advising Requirement Trees, then you must provide the link between Degree History majors and certifications and the Advising Aims and Requirements in Degree/Aim Cross Reference  Contributes to Program – Advising Requirement Trees © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     If you are licensed for Advising but are not yet using Advising to perform Degree Audits with Advising Trees, this is the Registration Configuration option you should select  Contributes to Program – Advising Program GPA Profiles © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     This provides a way you can associate courses with Majors or Certifications     Select the Major or Certification  •   Drag Advising Requirement Codes to the major or certification     You should include all courses that could contribute to a student’s degree such as general education courses  Contributes to Program – Advising Program GPA Profiles © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Parameters are passed to an Advising Module function  •   The return value tells the Credit Hours Update process whether or not that course contributes to ANY of the student’s financial aid eligible programs  •   If not, it is added to the non-required coursework count  Contributes to Program © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  The Process – Where?  RE   PF FAM © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Financial Aid Master  •   FA Eligible Enrolled Hours  •   POE Load  •   Previous Hours  •   Year Enrolled Hours  •   Career Earned Hours  •   Ineligible Hours  Financial Aid Master & Credit Hours Update Edit Report © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Displays either all students with some difference between Hours Before and After or specific hour difference based on a Credit Hours Boundary Code  Drop/Add Report © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Must select the POE information in Configure Optional Student Data Elements for Transfer.  •   Class load  •   # units  •   Current year units  •   Lifetime units  Moving Hours to PowerFAIDS © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     The 3 magic words!  •   Create Student Update  •   Select the population of students you want to move with the Selection Query  •   Select the POE you want to move hours for  •   Make sure you are selecting the correct Award Year under the Database Transfer tab.  Create Student Update © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Data Integration      External Update  •   Select the Table option  External Update in PowerFAIDS © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     After External Update runs, you should see hours and load in the POEs view of your student’s record.  POEs View in PowerFAIDS © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  1.   Credit Hours Update  2.   Create Student Update for Financial Aid  3.   Data Integration      External Update  Three Steps to Move Hours © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Questions? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort
